content: round 3 k3tog p1 7 times 14 sts finishing break yarn and pull through all remaining sts on needle se- cure with a knot in the inside of the hat weave in ends and block to finished measurements pg 2 hat can be blocked laying flat or over a ballon or hat form snowbird hat ~ ©2025 ~ all rights reserved ~ kalurah hudson ~ whiletheyplaydesigns com ~ page 4 snowbird hat ~ ©2025 ~ all rights reserved ~ kalurah hudson ~ whiletheyplaydesigns com ~ page 5
